mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, C.BOARD_ID, C.MEMBER_ID, C.BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, C.BOARD_COMMENT_CREATE_DATE, C.BOARD_COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_IMG_PATH, M.MEMBER_IMG_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TBL_BOARD_COMMENT_LIKE L WHERE L.BOARD_COMMENT_ID = C.ID) AS COMMENT_LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_BOARD_COMMENT C JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY C.BOARD_COMMENT_CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT TBC.ID, TBC.BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, TBC.BOARD_COMMENT_CREATE_DATE, TBM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_PATH, ( SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TBL_BOARD_COMMENT_LIKE WHERE BOARD_COMMENT_ID = TBC.ID ) AS BOARD_COMMENT_LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_BOARD_COMMENT TBC JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBC.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID WHERE TBC.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} ORDER BY BOARD_COMMENT_LIKE_COUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY
